slidelink.displaytext: Quick start of Collision Check and the Machine simulation
Select job for simulation and collision check
Switch to job in the hyperMILL browser
Switch to the Machine simulation window

search.slidetext: how to use this interactive tutorial go back and forward. (the tutorial must be continued by you) play and pause expand and collapse the menu elearning version 1.1
select the job (or more jobs) to start the machine simulation.a pp must be selected.
select the machine simulation menu item
the machine simulation will be loaded in a separate window.
at first the visibility can be setup for the simulation
in this case head and table is chosen even if machine parts are hidden, they are taken into account in the collision check
exit the machine setup and go back to the main menu
change view of lower area and tab content here
change view of upper area and tab content here
this button opens the settings dialogue for the collision check options
here you can set your collision check options finally confirm ok
start the collision check. important! collision check is not active automatically, it must be activated separately!
here you can switch on / off the material removal simulation. if switched on, the two rectangles on the simulation timeline become grey, for off they are blue
the machine simulation is started here. do not forget to perform the collision check before!
stop the simulation
clicking on the arrow allows to proceed the simulation stepwise
click for a short step
by double clicking next to the two buttons they turn grey and inactive and single step mode is enabled
single step mode is active now
click for single step
by double clicking again the single step mode is deactivated
with the left control dial you can change the rapid traverse simulation speed
with the right control dial you can change the feedrate simulation speed
collision check report shows the number of collisions. as next step analyse the simulation
confirm the collision report with ok
expand the collision list
analyze collisions
move to single collisions with right-clicking
start the simulation collisions are shown in red in the machine feedback and the code blocks are highlighted, too
stop the simulation
simulation remains open, and the changed data will be transferred to the machine simulation
go back to your hypercad-s session to edit the job
open the job
go to nc tab
change your preferred direction
confirm the new parameter, recalculation is not needed for changing the preferred direction
click the machine simulation menu item
go to your machine simulation session.all necessary data are transferred automatically
start the collision check again
no collision any longer. confirm with ok
start simulation again simulation ends without collision

notice the hypermill simulation center automatically saves the simulated swivel direction internally. to ensure that the simulation result matches the nc output, the stored solution must be adopted for the post processor run!
